articles.description: The 45-year-old portrays chain-smoking ranch owner Phil Burbank in Netflix film Power of the Dog, and looked every inch the Hollywood star at the movie's premiere in Los Angeles on Thursday.
articles.content:
Benedict Cumberbatch cut a suave figure as he attended the premiere of his new Netflix film, The Power of the Dog, at the 2021 AFI Fest in Hollywood on Thursday.
